name: Unknown Item
overview: Fleet Enemies include Saboteur, Commander, and Overcharge and can be encountered on T14 and beyond.

availability.description: They represent the most advanced enemy types in the game
availability.spawn_cap: Fleet enemies use the Normal enemy spawn cap (count toward the 120 normal enemy limit)

targeting_restrictions: The Magnetic Hook module cannot target fleet enemies
Plasma cannon cannot target fleet enemies
Smart Missile cannot target fleet enemies

special_properties.collision: Fleet enemies do not collide with other enemies
special_properties.range_behavior: Commander and Overcharge reach their range outside of tower range
special_properties.saboteur_behavior: Saboteur will fully approach the tower

saboteur.ability: Disables a random Ultimate Weapon when impacting the Tower
saboteur.recovery: Ultimate weapon is re-enabled when the Saboteur dies
saboteur.wall_interaction: Wall can prevent Saboteur from debuffing the tower
saboteur.attack_rolls: Attacks are rolled for thorns but not for Energy shield

commander.ability: Empowers enemies within an area, providing a 2x buff to enemy health

overcharge.ability: Shoots a returning projectile at the Tower
overcharge.damage_escalation: Deals double damage with each subsequent hit

rewards.scaling: The rewards scale with tier level
